snippet: Wednesday’s highlights from around the Web include an argument that Silicon Valley’s denizens have actually delighted in the political fiasco resulting from the government shutdown. Plus, a claim from a French organization that there’s no such...
abstract: Wednesday’s highlights from around the Web include an argument that Silicon Valley’s denizens have actually delighted in the political fiasco resulting from the government shutdown. Plus, a claim from a French organization that there’s no such thing as “anonymous data.”

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Shutdown Dysfunction, and Smile, You're Being Tracked
